about_the_game:
Choose your character from five distinct classes - Warrior, Mage, Cleric, Ranger, and Rogue. Each class features unique card types, along with class-specific abilities, allowing players to create powerful combos. You can also recruit up to two companions into your party, integrating cards from their classes into your deck.

In addition to party combinations, each character has the potential to take on multiple classes - the same card can trigger different effects when played by different characters. You can even have multiple characters team up to play a single card, demonstrating the power of cooperation.

Stick to a single pure class and specialize, or combine different classes to open up richer tactics - the possibilities are endless for creating the perfect deck for you!



The Shattered Realm contains ever-shifting environments with different spatial fragments intersecting, all permeated by dangers from the Void. Your adventure will traverse multiple spatial fragments to complete missions, with dynamic stage options making each run unique. Carefully choose your path in each stage selection - more dangerous stages may yield richer rewards, but will also test your deck against greater challenges.

Aside from dynamic stages, monsters and events on the map are randomly generated in each playthrough. Special events also feature class-specific options, greatly increasing replayability!



Voidmist - the manifestation of the Void - is the most lethal danger in the Shattered Realm. It thirsts to siphon energy from souls, spawning Void creatures to hunt all life within its reach. As its density increases, it empowers those creatures with ever greater deadliness.

During your journey, some maps allow freely moving and enable accumulating cards and equipments. However, the surrounding Voidmist also thickens gradually with time. Trigger all possible events and complete missions, or dash through the shortest path to reduce the threat of Voidmist. Choose wisely to prove your wisdom and valor in this perilous Shattered Realm!

name: Emblem of Valor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Emblem of Valor is a roguelike deck-building game combined with RPG elements. Form your party, level up your characters, collect powerful cards and equipments to overcome all threats in the Shattered Realm and prove your valor!
supported_languages: Traditional Chinese, English, Simplified Chinese, Japanese
